item.description:
I thought I'd post this so people were aware of it, I didn't know if people would want to go as a group or randomly run into one another. I'm meeting my friend Katie on Saturday there as we do this together annually. I will probably also go on Sunday. The website is www.yankeeshepherd.com and they have a schedule of events on the site somewhere, demos, sheep to shawl and lectures and classes. Admission is $5.00 for adults. Directions to the fairground are:

Directions: From I-93, take I-89 in Concord. Get off at Exit 7 and turn right on Rte. 103. From Vermont, take I-89 to Exit 7 and turn left on Rte. 103. From Keene, follow 9/202 to I-89. Go north to Exit 7 and turn right on Rte. 103. Follow Rte. 103/Park Avenue. The fairgrounds will be on your right. The entrance is at the Blue Gate.
item.name: NH Sheep and Wool Festival - Saturday
